attributes.action: To give everyone an 'annual carbon quota' card, similar to a credit card, which would be debited everytime the owner bought petrol, booked a flight or used public transport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The value of carbon credit on the card can be bought and sold, like milk quotas so that poorer owners could raise money on their carbon ration by selling to those rich enough to be able to afford to travel. This is fairer than road pricing which enables the rich to continue to pollute while denying the poor the ability to travel

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
